title: BAD PING FOR DAYS HELP!
body:
My ping has been having issues in my Minnesota area. My friends and I have found this out normally we have around 39 or 41 but lately ( last 3 weeks) it keeps going up I'm at 81 now, my other friends are at 100 and my one lucky friend only went up to 60 we all have century link besides one guy who has infinity ( even his went up) times to time it spikes to 360 or 240, I called century link and had them check everything out side, I got a new modem. Still no luck so RIOT can you please look at the servers for MINNESOTA AREA!? Ever sense those login errors we have had nothing but problems ( I think around 6.6 patch)

Thanks and any tips on how to fix would be welcome

note repairing LOL didn't help

replies.body: same problem here in Florida, 80 ping. FeelsBad

> [{quoted}](name=Lupred182,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xg1ym8bp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-09T21:14:13.856+0000)
>
> same problem here in Florida, 80 ping. FeelsBad

Florida here, with verizon and when the servers moved to Chicago at first i had a very consistent ping of 33 and over time it kept getting worse to the point where i have 57 and now i have a solid 73... I did nothing with my internet at all, it just slowly went up over time and this is so unbelievably frustrating! Today i just played a game of lucian thinking i had 57 ping but it turns out i had 75 and it also felt like there was some packet loss as well.
Also from Florida.  Was rock steady 62 and today has been very consistent 82.

Hmmm....it is definitely possible that there is some sort of weird routing issue going on that is causing you to have a higher than normal amount of ping.  There is a very clear difference between ping being consistently higher game to game (and constant) vs ping spiking randomly during games or from game to game.

For anyone in the Minnesota area who is experiencing this consistent higher than normal ping, make sure to run a [trace route to the NA servers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq2) and copy/paste the results in this thread so we can investigate further!
Any help yet?

I'm still having this issue :(

1. you in Minnesota?
2. Call century link or go on there support chat and let me know what they say.
3. email Riot and tell me what they say. Prob gonna say QWEST NODE is the issue......
thats exactly what happened and centurylink tells me that its all on the games server's end lmao
Right XD lol
think i'm swapping isp i cant think of any other fix since this has been going on for like a month
best of luck..... I can't I don't get any other ISP in my area. RIOT has stated that its there problem and they are working on fixing it.

I would just wait for it to get fixed but its not only affecting league my ping on other games seems to be pretty high too. I don't think centurylink cares enough to do anything about it though they are a pretty shit company

See i have 35 ping on over watch and league is still climbing with ping... 140 now.  seems like it IS your issue. Make sure you don't  have a filter on your phone line going into your modem.
call and have you or ( your parents call) and have them come out and check the box outside 
it should not cost you anything.

now its just 87... no more spikes but was is so much higher after 6.6? 
666= devil and 
three 6's 
a triangle has 3 sides

jk
Ill run the trace route thing
LOVE YOU ! thanks ill reply back

UPDATE!?! can i om you the thing results? or Email them to riot Id rather not just put that stuff on this page unless you can insure me that it wont make me vulnerable to attacks.

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xg1ym8bp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-09T21:37:07.790+0000)

> Hmmm....it is definitely possible that there is some sort of weird routing issue going on that is causing you to have a higher than normal amount of ping.  There is a very clear difference between ping being consistently higher game to game (and constant) vs ping spiking randomly during games or from game to game.

> For anyone in the Minnesota area who is experiencing this consistent higher than normal ping, make sure to run a [trace route to the NA servers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq2) and copy/paste the results in this thread so we can investigate further!


I"m from south east Texas, and still having the problem. I can play overwatch just fine. I can watch youtube just fine, twitch as well.  but get on league i'm sitting just above 90 ping, when i'm use to 80.

Hey DARTAGNAN... I can't help but notice the past few days the amount of times you have used the "weird connection issue" phrase when attempting to explain lag with players.. I am experiencing this too and I hope you riot employee's are just unable to fix the issue in some areas and are trying to cover it up? Just sayin :/

UPDATE! month later starts at 68, goes to 78 102 then 138 over and over and over again. Thankfully Over watch keeps my ping at 38 so ill happily put my time into that game until RIOT fixes the issue. 
Dear Riot please fix what ever you did to the network in patch 6.6 thank you.

Also in MN and been having the exact same experience as OP. I have centurylink too and started out in the 30s and since around 6.6 I've been in the mid 60s. About a week or two ago I was having spikes too, but this week I've been pretty consistently in the mid 60s. Something is going on...
you having any luck with ping problem??
I'm still having the same issue!

This has been happening since the outage about a month ago. Consistently 71 ping from 36.

You contact century link? chat with them over support chat and have them test you connection then get back to me please! 

Best of luck my friend

BUMP*&^* 
UPDATE 5/27/16
Ping at 76. 
Did a bunch of tests with  BowlO'Ramen
Tech Support - Fizz OP
"Lunch time!


Says Qwest Node is to blame. 

Talked to 6 Century link support people and nothing is wrong.
they reset everything, re routed me, came out to my house (again) 
So...... one support team is lying.... I just want this issue FIXED LIKE IT WAS BEFORE PATCH 6.6 AND BE FOR THE OUTAGES!

PLEASE AND THX RIOT GAMES, FIX YOUR SERVER ( with love)
I think we all have same problem.
welp so far I hopped into a custom game and my ping is at 75 which is better than normal lets hope that it stays.

just got through a couple of games finally with no ping issues. then started up another, and a few minutes into laning POOF, my ping shoots up to 150.  It climbed to 162 and stayed there for the longest.  Eventually it went back down to normal, but would randomly spike back up.. I think out of at 24 min game I had maybe 8 min total where I had no issues.

Having the same problem today. Playing with an unplayable 85 ping that feels more like a 150-200. Normally it's under 55, and I dont understand because 85 is not that far from 50's :/

East Coast server, Verizon internet. A friend is having the same problem as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Vesperuchi,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xg1ym8bp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-09T20:51:00.907+0000)

> East Coast server, Verizon internet. A friend is having the same problem as well.


I'm having same problem.  I played a few games today and all is well, and then poof about hour and half ago I get into a game and my ping is 95ms.  Nomally I sit at 80.  Though past week or so i've been bouncing between 75 to 80.   

I've even contacted my own ISP and we did tests and everything their and my ping and connection is fine.
